publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5705.1 Nigel Don: Freeze out Fuel Poverty for Cancer Patients—As an amendment to motion (S3M-5705) in the name of Des McNulty, leave out from "understands" to end and insert "welcomes the action taken by the Minster for Housing and Communities, Alex Neil, who has requested that the Fuel Poverty Forum investigate how eligibility can be extended for those who are chronically sick, including cancer patients, and living in fuel poverty, and believes that cancer patients should have the same rights and support as other vulnerable people." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-5705.1 Nigel Don: Freeze out Fuel Poverty for Cancer Patients—As an amendment to motion (S3M-5705) in the name of Des McNulty, leave out from "understands" to end and insert "welcomes the action taken by the Minster for Housing and Communities, Alex Neil, who has requested that the Fuel Poverty Forum investigate how eligibility can be extended for those who are chronically sick, including cancer patients, and living in fuel poverty, and believes that cancer patients should have the same rights and support as other vulnerable people." Supported by: John Wilson*, Dave Thompson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Kenneth Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Sandra White*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-5705.1 Freeze out Fuel Poverty for Cancer Patients (lodged on 23 February 2010) Bill Kidd*, Robin Harper*, Brian Adam*, Gil Paterson*
S3M-5705.1 Freeze out Fuel Poverty for Cancer Patients (lodged on 23 February 2010) Ian McKee*
